About Springtide

Springtide is your partner for all environmental matters with the purpose to reduce your environmental footprint.Read more

about springtide

About me

Hi, My name is Michiel van Leer and I am springtide. In 2017 I founded this business during my sabbatical, to be able share my experience and knowlegde with yourself, but also to generate income to kickstart the projects which you find in the my contribution section on this site.

about me

What I can do for you

Environmental Management systems

Environmental audits and inspections

Environmental programs and campaigns

Corporate governance and Compliance

Support start-ups and foundations

contact me What I can do for your

We are impressed by his capabillity to adapt to our culture and understand the objectives of the project and his abillity to connect with all share-holders. Not only did we understand the risks better, we also implemented hands-on measures and get all the share-holders committing to the environmental objectives. We definetely will recommend springtide and Michiel as our prefered supplier in our prefered supplier list.

Projects

“We do not inherit the Earth from our ancestors, we borrow it from our children.” Waldo Emerson, 1990

My contribution

My co2 emission compensation scheme

As I am very aware about my co2 emission coming from my lifestyle and from running my business I yearly compensate my emission by planting trees via Carbonfund. a share of my incoming from springtide.com is invested in renewed. Springtide can help you with your c02 calculations. Contact me contact or have a look at the "my contributions" page.

my contribution

My Environmental awareness training

One of the reasons for setting up this business if for me to fund and set-up an wide variety of practical and down to earth environmental awareness programs and especially one for childeren. They are the one who can be make a change, can adapt easier and have a great sense of wonder. I am a strong believer that a lot of damage to the planet can be avoided by people being aware about the impact of their actions. Maybe this is a reason for you to contact me contact or have a look at the "my contributions" page.

my contribution

Kids awareness training

Childeren can make a difference! In a playful and practical section we empower them to make a change.

Company awareness training

Either part of the requirements of certification or just to raise awareness. I will try to show the beauty of the oceans and the impact business processes have on the earth.

Public awareness training

We all have an impact, and we all can contribute to bring climate change to a stop. Small things do help. In this training, I make people aware about the change they can make in their daily actions.

Recent blogs

Impact of shipping in the artic

Now the ice-caps in the north-pole is melting, a new shipping-lane is opening. What will be the impact of more ships passing the north passage have on the environment and are the current guidelines enough to protect this fertile area.Do we need to set-up dedicated inspections before the ships actually passing? This article actually looks in to this matter!
